actions.text: Amendment SA 2926 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 135.

Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Young to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4265-4272; text: CR S4265) To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct a study on the effectiveness of the Veterans Crisis Line.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2926 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 135.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2926 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 135.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2926 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Young to Amendment SA 2910.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct a study on the effectiveness of the Veterans Crisis Line.
